availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob Mace (Portsmouth, Ohio, banker and farmer)

body.p: Portsmouth, Ohio, banker and farmer. Ohio native. Married to Rachel Mace. Father of Morgan Mace, Ann Mace, and Andrew C. Mace. Farmer in Ross County, Ohio. Partner of the Banking House of Thomas Dugan & Co. at Portsmouth in 1865.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Ohio, Ross County, Liberty, p. 27; "Nearing the End," The Chillicothe Gazette (Chillicothe, O.), August 18, 1893, p. 1; Find A Grave, "Jacob Mace (1809-1895)," Memorial #67215194, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=MAC&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=37&GScntry=4&GSsr=1081&GRid=67215194& (accessed May 9, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0392.
